articles.title: Ukraine halts some Russian gas flows, claims battlefield gains - Reuters.com
articles.description: Flows of Russian gas to Europe through a key transit point in Ukraine dried up on Wednesday, while Kyiv claimed battlefield gains over invading Russian forces, including the recapture of four villages around the second city of Kharkiv.

articles.title: Russia responsible for satellite hack causing chaos across Europe - The Telegraph

articles.content:
